hero.subtitle: Web Developer • Web creator
about.title: About Me
about.left.page1:
I am a third-year student at Adam Mickiewicz University in Poznań, passionate about web design, application development and artificial intelligence.

My student journey is complemented by hands-on experience gained during internships and work in the tech industry. During an internship at M3 Group I worked as a web designer (WordPress) and app designer using FlutterFlow, honing my skills in building user-friendly and responsive web solutions.
about.left.page2: I currently serve as a administrator and web designer for EDU-CZAR and DermaExpert. In these roles I manage and develop their websites, ensuring functionality, visual appeal and usability.
about.left.page3:
I continually expand my knowledge and take on new challenges in technology and design. My projects focus on creating intuitive user interfaces and modern web solutions.

With experience and certifications such as Fundamentals of Accelerated Computing with CUDA Python, Fundamentals of Deep Learning and Generative AI with Diffusion Models, I am prepared to take the next steps in my career.
about.right.title: A bit more about me...
about.right.page1: Outside of work, I am personally interested in artificial intelligence and have been exploring AI tools for several years. I also create digital materials using tools like FL Studio, Adobe Premiere Pro and GIMP.
about.right.page2: In my free time I also enjoy video games and movies, which help me relax and draw visual and conceptual inspirations for my projects.
